{{Vital article| topic = People | level = 4 | class = B}} {{FailedGA|2007-03-31}} {{On this day|date1=2012-06-03|oldid1=495705095|date2=2016-06-03|oldid2=723444517}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|collapsed=yes|1= {{WikiProject Biography|living=no |class=B |a&e-priority=High |core=yes |a&e-work-group=yes |listas=Warhol, Andy}} {{WikiProject Crime|class=B |importance=low}} {{WikiProject History of photography|class=B}} {{WikiProject LGBT studies|class=B |person=yes}} {{WikiProject Media|class=B |importance=High}} {{WikiProject New York City|class=B |importance=High}} {{WikiProject Pennsylvania|class=B |importance=mid}} {{WikiProject Pittsburgh|class=B |importance=mid}} {{WikiProject Philosophy|aesthetics=yes |importance=mid |class=B}} {{WikiProject Visual arts|class=B}} {{WP1.0|class=B |category=Arts |v0.5=yes |WPCD=yes |importance=High}} }} {{Find sources notice}} {{User:MiszaBot/config |archiveheader = {{talk archive navigation|noredlinks=y}} |maxarchivesize = 120K |counter = 2 |minthreadsleft = 10 |minthreadstoarchive = 1 |algo = old(365d) |archive = Talk:Andy Warhol/Archive %(counter)d }} {{Archive box|auto=yes |search=yes |bot=lowercase sigmabot III |age=12 |units=months |index=/Archive index }} {{User:HBC Archive Indexerbot/OptIn |target=/Archive index |mask=/Archive <#> |leading_zeros=0 |indexhere=yes }} == Warhol's Early Life contains a misprint == Warhol was not a hypochondriac, he had Nosocomephobia. Hypochondria means that you constantly seek medical attention for everything. Warhol had an intense fear or hospitals. Completely different. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/71.180.188.115|71.180.188.115]] ([[User talk:71.180.188.115|talk]]) 18:05, 18 April 2015 (UTC) :If you have a source, it can be corrected. [[User:Willondon|Willondon]] ([[User talk:Willondon|talk]]) 19:27, 18 April 2015 (UTC) i agree [[User:Jeffjr145|Jeffjr145]] ([[User talk:Jeffjr145|talk]]) 20:50, 30 March 2016 (UTC) == Semi-protected edit request on 16 October 2015 == {{edit semi-protected|Andy Warhol|answered=yes}} On January 12, 1985, Andy Warhol together with Joseph Beuys and the Japanese artist Kaii Higashiyama involved in the "Global-Art-Fusion" project. This was a digital Fax-Art project, initiated by the conceptual artist Ueli Fuchser, in which a fax was sent with drawings of all three artist within 32 minutes around the world - from Dusseldorf (Germany) via New York (USA) to Tokyo (Japan), received at Vienna's Palais Liechtenstein Museum of Modern Art. This fax was a sign of peace during the Cold War in the 1980ies. André Chahil: [http://andrechahil.com/wien-1985-phaenomen-fax-art-beuys-warhol-und-higashiyama-setzen-dem-kalten-krieg-ein-zeichen ''Wien 1985: Phänomen Fax-Art. Beuys, Warhol und Higashiyama setzen dem Kalten Krieg ein Zeichen.''] {{reflist-talk}} [[User:A. Chahil|A. Chahil]] ([[User talk:A. Chahil|talk]]) 12:48, 16 October 2015 (UTC) :[[File:Red information icon with gradient background.svg|20px|link=]] '''Not done for now:''' Doesn't appear to be [[WP:UNDUE|a major part of his life/career]]. I will happily add if consensus says I should, however. [[User:Mdann52|Mdann52]] ([[User talk:Mdann52|talk]]) 19:29, 28 November 2015 (UTC) == Edit request: duplicate information in one section == Information about Andy's siblings is repeated twice within the Early life (1928–1949)section. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[User:Blahblah986|Blahblah986]] ([[User talk:Blahblah986|talk]] • [[Special:Contributions/Blahblah986|contribs]]) 20:41, 22 October 2015 (UTC) ::Done. [[User:Willondon|Willondon]] ([[User talk:Willondon|talk]]) 21:38, 28 November 2015 (UTC) ==Sexuality== For the record: some good references that help demolish the ridiculous suggestion that Warhol was asexual. Interview with Billy Name: Q. And was Warhol a sexual entity within this, or just a voyeur? A. He was an essential sexual entity. He was the essence of sexuality. It permeated everything. Andy exuded it, along with his great artistic creativity. Sexuality was part of the glamour – we expressed it like teenagers. It brought a joy to the whole art world in New York. http://civilianglobal.com/arts/the-man-who-silvered-the-andy-warhol-factory-billy-name-lou-reed-ondine-1960s-new-york/ And from a round table discussion with Warhol Superstars including BillyBoy*: "I had to tell this one day because it's been asked so many times and I've avoided it so much…Andy Warhol and I had orgasms simultaneously and I don't know why people are so curious about that." One the Roundtable participants replies "Because he looks like he never had sex and acts like he never had sex!" BillyBoy replies: "That's just an act… When he wasn't being Andy Warhol and when you were just alone with him he was an incredibly generous and very kind person. What seduced me was the Andy Warhol who I saw alone. In fact when I was with him in public he kind of got on my nerves….I'd say: 'You're just obnoxious, I can't bear you." https://myspace.com/buechsenoeffner/video/warhol-superstars-part-one-sex-with-andy/26815015 [[User:Engleham|Engleham]] ([[User talk:Engleham|talk]]) 16:58, 19 January 2016 (UTC) == Semi-protected edit request on 6 February 2016 == {{edit semi-protected|Andy Warhol|answered=yes}} Please change " Warhol was gay.[106][107]" to "Biographers have identified Warhol as gay" Andy Warhol did attend mass at St. Vincent Ferrer on a neear daily basis ( I was also a parishioner). It is unlikely that he would have self-identified as gay. Also, we cannot be sure that 'gay' would be the correct identity if he did not identify as heterosexual. I do, however, respect the views of his biographers. [[User:Matriceprivat|Matriceprivat]] ([[User talk:Matriceprivat|talk]]) 23:45, 6 February 2016 (UTC) :[[File:Red information icon with gradient background.svg|20px|link=]] '''Not done for now:''' I highly doubt your wording would be correct here, but I do want to hear from some other editors on this matter. --[[User:Allthefoxes|allthefoxes]] ([[User_talk:Allthefoxes|Talk]]) 02:51, 7 February 2016 (UTC) == Semi-protected edit request on 2 March 2016 == {{edit semi-protected|Andy Warhol|answered=y}} [[Special:Contributions/50.195.57.97|50.195.57.97]] ([[User talk:50.195.57.97|talk]]) 15:51, 2 March 2016 (UTC) :[[File:Red information icon with gradient background.svg|20px|link=]] '''Not done:''' as you have not requested a change.
If you want to suggest a change, please request this in the form "Please replace XXX with YYY" or "Please add ZZZ between PPP and QQQ".
Please also cite [[WP:RS|reliable sources]] to back up your request, without which no information should be added to, or changed in, any article. - [[User:Arjayay|Arjayay]] ([[User talk:Arjayay|talk]]) 15:59, 2 March 2016 (UTC) == Semi-protected edit request on 25 March 2016 == {{edit semi-protected|Andy Warhol|answered=yes}} Original text: Other members of Warhol's Factory crowd included Freddie Herko, Ondine, Ronald Tavel, Mary Woronov, Billy Name, and Brigid Berlin (from whom he apparently got the idea to tape-record his phone conversations).[31] Please change to: "Other members of Warhol's Factory crowd included Freddie Herko, Ondine, Ronald Tavel, Mary Woronov, Billy Name, artist Richard Bernstein who painted the covers of Interview Magazine in the 1970s and 1980s and Brigid Berlin (from whom he apparently got the idea to tape-record his phone conversations).[31] [[User:Coachrdawg|Coachrdawg]] ([[User talk:Coachrdawg|talk]]) 19:09, 25 March 2016 (UTC) :[[File:Red information icon with gradient background.svg|20px|link=]] '''Not done:''' please provide [[WP:RS|reliable sources]] that support the change you want to be made. --[[User_talk:Northiie|Nor]][[Special:Contributions/Northiie|thi]][[User:TerraCodes|ie]] 16:18, 31 March 2016 (UTC) == Semi-protected edit request on 11 April 2016 == {{edit semi-protected|Andy Warhol|answered=yes}} Please edit reference number 76 to be redirected to [https://artnigeria.com/2016/04/11/the-highest-total-sale-at-any-art-auction/ The highest total sale at any art auction] Thank You Abey Solomon 12:46, 11 April 2016 (UTC) :[[File:Red information icon with gradient background.svg|20px|link=]] '''Not done:''' please establish a [[Wikipedia:Consensus|consensus]] for this alteration '''[[Wikipedia:Edit requests|before]]''' using the {{tlx|edit semi-protected}} template. [[User talk:Becky Sayles|''' B E C K Y S A Y L E S ''']] 07:53, 23 April 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:14|one external link|14 external links}} on [[Andy Warhol]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=738860551 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information.
